IONIAN SEA.
DNC 09.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS 0500Z TO 2100Z DAILY
   MONDAY THRU THURSDAY AND 0500Z TO 1300Z
   FRIDAYS 01 JAN THRU 31 DEC 19 EXCEPT HOLIDAYS

2. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 JAN 20.
